title: Ramona and Iris... and the Coronavirus
description: Iris is a clever squirrelOn a mission to help a scared girl:Her dear friend RamonaFull of fright at CoronaThe virus that's shaken our worldThis is a rhyming picture book for 5-10 year-old kids who have been affected by the coronavirus pandemic. It tells the story of two friends who are figuring out how to stay safe and help the world mend. This book was written and illustrated by two medical students from the Harvard-MIT Health Sciences and Technology program as a way to help little ones have less anxiety and feel more empowered during the lockdown.
author: Katherine Redfield
